item.title: Law Enforcement And Anonymous Transactions
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure Law enforcement and anonymous transactions Jason Weinstein, Blockchain Alliance, moderator Brian Klein, Baker Marquart Prakash Santhana, Deloitte James Smith, Elliptic Zooko Wilcox, doing essential zooko things (zerocash) Ladies and gentlemen. Please take your seats. The session is about to begin. Please welcome Jason Weinstein, Brian Klein, Prakash Santhana, James Smith, and Zooko Wilcox. JW: Any proof-of-work finalists should go to the 7th floor elevators and leave right now.
